import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const links = [ { name: 'Hire me', href: '#' }, { name: 'Download CV', href: '#' }, ] const stats = [ { name: 'Projects', value: '3' }, { name: 'Hours of experience', value: '300+' }, { name: 'Hours per week', value: '40' }, { name: 'Loyalty', value: 'Unlimited' }, ] export default function Example() { return (

Hi, I am Rohit.

I am a web-developer, web designer

and a technology enthusiast.

{links.map((link) => ( {link.name} ))}
{stats.map((stat) => (
{stat.name}
{stat.value}
))}
) }
